summary: Twin Breton mages from Daggerfall. Both very good at what they do, but with differing personalities.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=5][b][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXAP0sJ.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff7700]THE DEVEREUX TWINS[/color][/b]
~ Lumiere & Lucien ~
[/size][size=4]by SA547[/size][/font][/center][font=Georgia]

The twins, restless scions of a wealthy family of mages and traders from Daggerfall, they have arrived in Skyrim in search for adventure and discovery. Well, being so precocious they knew they were too smart for even Winterhold College to hold them.

These young Bretons are currently staying at the [b][color=#ff7700]Old Hroldan Inn[/color][/b].

Lucien is the easygoing young man, even as he'd been half-blind because of an accident while at school, mixing a rather deadly alchemical mixture for a potion. He's known for his use of ice-based offensive skills.

On the other hand, pretty and petite Lumiere is not known for talking politely, expecting you to fetch her books, but she's as skilled as her brother, fire-based spells matching her fierce personality.

Both of them, being explorers in their youth, have known about traps and thus they can simply sidestep over them, or sneak over to start a prank without being seen. If needed be, they can wield sword and bow, and despite their differing personalities, they'll also try to heal anyone in their company.

To be sure and known, they wear their own distinct robes, only that these were specially weaved and enchanted to ensure the highest possible protection from the dangers of the world and in combat.

[b][color=#e69138]Features[/color][/b]

[list]
[*]As battlemages, possesses offensive and defensive magical skills
[*]Marriageable
[*]Further customization for MO users, in that they can extract the BSA and make personal changes as they wish (i.e. different body mesh and/or textures)
[*]Freely-compatible with any skeleton system, including BFQ, XPMS and XPMSE3. This is done in such a way as to prevent any CTDs while using XPMSE3.
[*]For FCO users, Lucien uses the YoungEagerMale voice; Lumiere the FemaleCondescending voice.
[/list]
[b][color=#f6b26b]Recommended Mods[/color][/b]

[list]
[*]Enhanced Follower Framework - allows to customize them by providing additional magic spells.
[*]Amazing Follower Tweaks
[*]Follower Commentary Overhaul
[/list]
[/font][font=Georgia][b][color=#f6b26b]Resource Credits[/color]

[/b][/font][font=Georgia][i]Lucien:[/i][/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]
[list]

[/list][/font][font=Georgia][i]
Lumiere:[/i][/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]

[*]Leito86 and phygit -- Femfeet Redesigned for UNP -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?
[*]MrTroubleMaker -- Better Hand Mesh for UNP UNPB UNPC -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30179/?
[/list][/font][font=Georgia][i]
Both:

[/i][/font][font=Georgia][list]
[*]KS Hairdos Renewal by Kalilies/Stealthic Khaos/Shockky -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?
[*]Portions of Bethesda Performance Textures (Armor/Clothing/Weapons) by Gamwich -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42360
[/list][/font][font=Georgia][i]
